questions.stem: What is considered the most important health problem for adolescents?

options: The main causes of death and illness among adolescents are not preventable.
Investing in adolescents' health is cost-effective.
Adolescence is an important period of growth.

options: Suicide is the leading cause of death during adolescence.

questions.stem: Injuries account for 75% of all adolescent deaths and for the greatest loss of Disability Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) in high-income countries.
Suicide ranks number one among causes of death during adolescence, and depression is the top cause of illness and disability.
